name: Untitled Bear Game
description:
~prototype~

scenes may take a few seconds to load

-------------------------

Bears shouldn't have to rummage through bins for food, so why not steal it straight from people's houses?

A casual 2D platformer with stealth and strategy elements. In each level the player must sneak around rooms/buildings to find and collect stashes of food, and leave the area back through the entrance without being caught.

-------------------------

Keyboard Controls:

  • Left Arrow / A = Move Left
  • Right Arrow / D = Move Right
  • Down Arrow / S = Move Down (through platforms)
  • Space = Jump
  • E = Hide / Advance Dialogue

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Stick = Move
  • Button South = Jump
  • Button West = Hide / Advance Dialogue

All assets (excluding audio) are originally created.
